Adventurer Helper:
Any adventurers dyung to visit the Blazing Sawmp? Wait, I read that wrong... plan on dying when you visit the Blazing Swamp.
Everyone knows the tale of the legendary battles that took place in the Blazing Swamp when King Amadeo`s armies destroyed their enemies during the Aden Elmore Wars. While they saw victory, many died and found their final resting place withing the lava filed swamp.
Now the swamp is filed with creatures preventing those who wish to pay their respects to the fallen heroes.
